subtitleNullable: Tax related news scraped from brazilian newspapers
descriptionNullable:
Tax related news scrapped from the website of two big brazilian digital newspapers covering economics, business and law: Jota and Valor Economico.

This dataset contains the date, title and description of each article. Articles' texts themselves aren't availabe since they are behind paywalls in both websites. 

Some duplicates can be found into the dataset, but this is part of the nature of collecting news data from the web: news outlets are constantly updating already posted articles, either factually correcting them or re writing them in a way to better convey their point of view. 

The scrapper can be found at https://github.com/araleo/clippings-juridicos

No paywalls were cheated in order to build this datasaet.
All data obtained is publically available on the internet at no cost.

Info:
Separator: ;
Encoding: UTF-8
